name: Elon Musk
about: Elon Musk, aka Elon Reeve Musk, is an engineer, industrial designer, tech entrepreneur, and philanthropist.

name: Jeff Bezos
about: Jeffrey Preston Bezos is an American internet entrepreneur, industrialist, media owner, and investor, best known as the founder, CEO, and chairman of the worldwide technology company Amazon.

name: Bernard Arnault
about: Bernard Arnault is a French businessman.He is chairman and managing director of LVMH, the world's largest luxury goods company.

name: Bill Gates
about: William Henry Bill Gates III, better known as Bill Gates, is an American entrepreneur, software developer, author, investor, and businessman.

name: Larry Page
about: is an American software engineer and entrepreneur who is the developer of the basic algorithms of the web search engine Google and the founder of the Google company with Sergey Brin.

name: Mark Zuckerberg
about: Mark Elliot Zuckerberg is an American computer programmer, entrepreneur and founder of Meta.

name: Serger Brin
about: Sergey Brin is an American software engineer and internet entrepreneur who co-founded Google with Larry Page.

name: Steve Ballmer
about: Steven Anthony Steve Ballmer is an American businessman who appeared in Microsoft's 1.0 ad in 1986 and has been Microsoft's chairman of the board since 2000.

name: Larry Ellison
about: Lawrence Joseph Ellison is a billionaire businessman, founder and CEO of database software firm Oracle.

name: Warren Buffet
about: Warren Edward Buffett is an American businessman and stock investor. He is cited as one of the most successful investors of the 20th century.
